name: SAK Signature Dress SEWING PATTERN Size 6 to 10 - PDF File
description:
This listing is for a PATTERN by Simply Annie Kate

SAK Signature Dress sizes 6-10 (sizes 12m-5T pattern is also available for sale in the shop!)

***INSTANT FILE DELIVERY: After you check out you will be sent an order email from Big Cartel with a secure download link for this epattern - Easy and Instant!

Pattern includes:

*Detailed instructions, with photos, to guide you through the entire pattern 
*No pattern pieces to fuss with! Measurements only! 
*Information on how to lengthen and shorten your dress to YOUR desired length 
*Tips for shirring 
*Bonus instructions for adding an additional bottom ruffle made from your desired fabric 
*Bonus instructions on how to make a complimentary sash or headwrap 
*Tips on how to make the inside of your dress look professional, even if you don't have a serger. 
*SUPPORT - after purchase, you may contact me through phone or email with ANY questions you have

This pattern is perfect for beginners, as well as, advanced seamstresses. Please do not hesitate to contact me with any questions or concerns.

**Prerequisite skills - you will need to be able to make a button hole for this pattern. If you are unsure how, simply refer to your machine owner's manual for instructions

Proud of your work?!?! I would love to see your finished products, please feel free to post your pictures at http://facebook.com/sewingwithsak - You can also use this site to post questions and suggestions about any SAK patterns.

IMPORTANT COPYRIGHT INFORMATION: 
SAK Signature Dress© 2010 Katherine Ricca/Simply Annie Kate 
All Rights Reserved. This pattern is for the home sewer only and not for commercial or mass market use. This pattern may not be copied, shared or resold. Handmade dresses may be sold in LIMITED quantities, however, credit must be given to Simply Annie Kate in listing description or listing tags.
